name: Beauty and the Beast
overview: The wondrous story of Beauty and the Beast is marvelously told by Mia Farrow, with entrancing music by Ernest Troost. this enchanting tale is set in a rich and glowing palace ruled by a beastly creature. Could anyone ever love such a Beast? Only a shy, beautiful girl who wants to save her Fathers life, and learns that what we are all bout to discover – to trust your heart and not your eyes.
